rows.description: Content to be displayed next to the checkbox.
Aria label for accessibility. Provides additional context for screen readers.
Defines the color of the checkbox. Options are: 'default-light', 'default-dark', 'primary', 'secondary', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'.
Callback function triggered when the checkbox is clicked
Inline styles to be applied to the checkbox container.
Defines the size of the checkbox. Options are: 'sm', 'md', 'lg'.
Defines the border-radius of the checkbox. Options are: 'none', 'sm', 'md', 'full'.
Defines the border width of the checkbox. Options are: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'none'.
Additional CSS class names to apply to the checkbox container.
Defines the position of the label. Options are: 'left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom'.
